DescribeBizTrend.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dayu.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeBizTrend
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Domain": "xx", 
    "Statistics": "xx", 
    "Business": "xx", 
    "ProtoInfo": [
        {
            "Protocol": "xx", 
            "Port": 1
        }
    ], 
    "Period": 1, 
    "StartTime": "2020-09-22 00:00:00", 
    "EndTime": "2020-09-22 00:00:00", 
    "Id": "xx", 
    "MetricName": "xx"
}
